tool_description: Cheap SMS API for receiving SMS on 60+ phone numbers for phone verification (2FA) or to prevent spam. Receive SMS.
name: SMS API
title: SMS API

api_list.name: Get messages for number
api_list.description:
GET endpoint to get all messages from a number, with sender, message content, and timestamp supplied.
Messages in this list are in reverse order, so the latest message is at index 0.
The number parameter takes the `full_int` result from the /numbers endpoint.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sms-api29.p.rapidapi.com/messages/16467323660"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sms-api29.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sms-api29.p.rapidapi.com/messages/{number}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sms-api29.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get numbers
api_list.description: Simple GET endpoint to retrieve all available phone numbers in various representations.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sms-api29.p.rapidapi.com/numbers"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sms-api29.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
